summary: Govert Miereveld is a schoolteacher who has an unhealthy obsession with Fran, one of his students. On the day of Fran's graduation, Govert decides that he needs to tell her.
cast: Senne Rouffaer|Beata Tyszkiewicz|Hector Camerlynck|Hilde Uitterlinden|Annemarie Van Dijk|Hilda Van Roose|François Beukelaers|Arlette Emmery|Paul S'Jongers|Luc Philips|François Bernard|Vic Moeremans|Maurits Goossens|Yvonne Lex|Dora van der Groen
title: El hombre del cráneo rasurado
